jp.ac.keio.bio.fun.xitosbml.geometry

Class ImageGeometryData

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.ac.keio.bio.fun.xitosbml.geometry.AbstractData
      • jp.ac.keio.bio.fun.xitosbml.geometry.ImageGeometryData
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnalyticGeometryData, SampledFieldGeometryData

    public abstract class ImageGeometryData
extends AbstractData
    The class ImageGeometryData, which is an abstract class and be used to create data objects for geometry objects (AnalyticGeometryData, SampledFieldGeometryData and ParametricGeometryData). The inherited class should implement getSampledValues(), createImage() and getSpatialImage() methods. Date Created: Jun 25, 2015
    Author:
    Kaito Ii <ii@fun.bio.keio.ac.jp>, Akira Funahashi <funa@bio.keio.ac.jp>

      Fields

      protected org.sbml.jsbml.ext.spatial.Geometry g
      The Geometry object.
      protected HashMap<String,Integer> hashSampledValue
      The hashmap of sampled value of spatial image.
      protected ij.ImagePlus img
      The ImageJ image object.
      protected byte[] raw
      The raw data of spatial image in 1D array.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      abstract SpatialImage getSpatialImage()
      Create and return a new spatial image.

    • Method Detail

      • getSpatialImage

        public abstract SpatialImage getSpatialImage()
        Create and return a new spatial image. SpatialImage object is generated with the ImagePlus object (img) and the hashmap of sampled value (pixel value of a SampledVolume).
        Returns:
        spatial image object, which is an object for handling spatial image in XitoSBML.
